section.name: swingactions.properties
section.p:
The swingactions.properties file contains the ActionManager factory implementation class name and the path the the configuration resource. For example:
org.jcomponent.swingactions.factory=org.jcomponent.swingactions.XMLActionManagerFactory org.jcomponent.swingactions.configuration.file=/path/to/actionconfig.xml

section.name: ActionManagerFactory
section.p: One can also instantiate directly one of the above ActionManagerFactory classes and call the create method with the appropriate configuration parameters. The configuration map may contain different resources indexed by the class name:

The possible factory classes are:
org.w3c.dom.Element
java.io.InputStream
